examples: Constance was resolved not to cry
synonyms: set "he was resolved to marry her"

definitions.definition: settle or find a solution to (a problem, dispute, or contentious matter).
examples: the firm aims to resolve problems within 30 days
synonyms: figure out "this matter cannot be resolved overnight"

definitions.definition: cause (a symptom or condition) to disperse, subside, or heal.
examples: endoscopic biliary drainage can rapidly resolve jaundice

definitions.definition: (of a symptom or condition) disperse, subside, or heal.
examples: symptoms resolved after a median of four weeks

definitions.definition: (of a discord) lead into a concord during the course of harmonic change.
cause (a discord) to pass into a concord.
decide firmly on a course of action.
examples: she resolved to call Dana as soon as she got home
synonyms: make a decision "Bob resolved not to wait any longer"

definitions.definition: (of a legislative body, committee, or other formal meeting) make a decision by a formal vote.
examples: the committee resolved that teachers should make their recommendations without knowledge of test scores
synonyms: agree "the committee resolved that the project should proceed"

definitions.definition: separate or cause to be separated into components.
examples: break down/up, separate, reduce, divide the compounds were resolved into their active constituents

definitions.definition: reduce a subject, statement, etc., by mental analysis into (separate elements or a more elementary form).
examples: the ability to resolve facts into their legal categories
synonyms: categorize "the ability to resolve facts into their legal categories"

definitions.definition: (of something seen at a distance) turn into a different form when seen more clearly.
examples: the orange glow resolved itself into four lanterns
synonyms: be converted "the gray smudge resolved into a sandy beach"

definitions.definition: (of optical or photographic equipment) separate or distinguish between (closely adjacent objects).
examples: Hubble was able to resolve six variable stars in M31

definitions.definition: separately distinguish (peaks in a graph or spectrum).
analyze (a force or velocity) into components acting in particular directions.
